methodology: Analyzed Stage 1 signals (2026-01-09 to 2026-01-12) to identify frequently cited sources not in current regular-sources.json. Cross-referenced with web searches for 2026 forecast reports, policy briefs, and emerging technology white papers.

discovery_summary.citation_threshold: 3+ citations or high relevance to STEEPS categories

new_sources.name: TRENDS Research & Advisory
new_sources.discovery_path: Cited in search results for '2026 forecast report' - published comprehensive 2026 political/strategic/economic trajectories report
new_sources.organization_type: Research institute and strategic advisory firm
focus_areas: Regional analysis (Middle East, Asia, Africa, Europe, US, China)
new_sources.update_frequency: Weekly to monthly reports, annual outlooks
new_sources.justification: Comprehensive geopolitical think tank with strong MENA perspective, fills gap in non-Western strategic analysis. Publishes detailed annual forecasts.
new_sources.sample_publication: Political, Strategic, and Economic Trajectories in 2026 (Dec 2025)
new_sources.validation_status: High credibility - operates advisory board, scientific council, serves governments

new_sources.name: Visual Capitalist
new_sources.discovery_path: Multiple references in economic and technology forecasts - publishes '2026 Global Forecast Report' aggregating 2000+ predictions
new_sources.justification: Aggregates predictions from leading economists and strategists into accessible visualizations. Strong at synthesizing multiple expert forecasts.
new_sources.validation_status: Established data journalism platform with strong reputation for visualization quality

new_sources.name: Info-Tech Research Group
new_sources.discovery_path: Cited for 'Tech Trends 2026' report - IT analyst firm serving CIOs and IT leaders
new_sources.justification: Enterprise IT perspective complements consumer tech coverage. Strong on organizational AI adoption and IT leadership trends.
new_sources.validation_status: Established IT analyst firm comparable to Gartner/Forrester

new_sources.name: TechPolicy.Press
new_sources.discovery_path: Cited in AI regulation policy searches - nonprofit media covering tech and democracy intersection
new_sources.leadership: Contributors include Public Citizen policy advocates, tech policy experts
new_sources.justification: Expert policy analysis at tech-democracy intersection. Synthesizes multiple expert perspectives on emerging tech governance.
new_sources.sample_publication: Expert Predictions on What's at Stake in AI Policy in 2026
new_sources.validation_status: Credible nonprofit with fellowship programs and expert contributor network

new_sources.name: The Quantum Insider
new_sources.discovery_path: Cited 3+ times in Stage 1 signals - leading quantum technology news and market intelligence
new_sources.organization_type: Quantum technology news and market intelligence platform
new_sources.justification: Dominant source for quantum technology trends. Partners include Microsoft, AWS, The Economist. Critical for tracking quantum inflection points.
new_sources.validation_status: Leading quantum industry news platform with enterprise intelligence products

new_sources.name: StartUs Insights
new_sources.discovery_path: Cited multiple times for breakthrough technology forecasts - AI-powered innovation discovery platform
new_sources.organization_type: Innovation intelligence and startup scouting platform
new_sources.justification: Comprehensive innovation intelligence with 9M+ startup database. Strong on technology adoption timelines and ROI forecasts.
new_sources.validation_status: Enterprise innovation platform serving 1500+ Fortune 500 clients

new_sources.name: IntuitionLabs
new_sources.discovery_path: Cited in Stage 1 biotech signals - publishes detailed AI biotech funding and trend analysis
new_sources.organization_type: AI software for life sciences + research publisher
new_sources.justification: Specialized biotech + AI intersection analysis. Publishes detailed VC funding reports and trend forecasts specific to AI biotech sector.
sample_publications: Top Biotech Startups 2026: An Analysis of Emerging Trends
AI Biotech Funding: A 2025 Analysis of VC Investment Trends
AI Compute Demand in Biotech: 2025 Report
new_sources.validation_status: Credible biotech-focused research with detailed data analysis

new_sources.name: YPulse
new_sources.discovery_path: Cited in Gen Z trend signals - leading Gen Z and Millennial research platform
new_sources.organization_type: Youth intelligence and market research platform
new_sources.update_frequency: Daily articles, weekly deep-dives, quarterly reports
new_sources.justification: Dominant Gen Z/Millennial research platform. Critical for tracking generational shifts, cultural trends, and consumer behavior evolution.
sample_publications: 10 Gen Z Trends Every Brand Should Know Before 2026
new_sources.validation_status: Established youth research platform with major brand clients and proprietary data

new_sources.name: War on the Rocks
new_sources.discovery_path: Cited in Stage 1 political signals - authoritative defense and national security analysis
new_sources.contributor_profile: Military personnel, veterans, government officials, defense academics
new_sources.editorial_lens: Realist perspective on foreign policy and national security
new_sources.justification: Leading defense analysis platform 'For insiders. By insiders.' Critical for understanding defense tech, geopolitics, and strategic trends.
sample_publications: The Burn and the Choke: Why Semiconductor Controls Will Outlast China's Rare Earth Weapon (2026)
new_sources.validation_status: Highly credible in defense circles - read by policymakers and military leaders

new_sources.name: Spring Health Research
new_sources.discovery_path: Cited in Stage 1 spiritual/social signals - publishes major workplace mental health research
new_sources.organization_type: Mental health benefits platform + research publisher
focus_areas: Future of work and mental health
new_sources.update_frequency: Weekly blog posts, quarterly major reports
new_sources.research_credentials: Peer-reviewed studies published in Online Journal of Public Health Informatics (OJPHI)
new_sources.justification: Leading workplace mental health research with clinical rigor. Important for tracking spiritual/wellbeing trends and their economic impact.
sample_publications: 2026 Mental Health Trends for Your Workplace
2025 Mental Health at Work Report: Closing the Benefits Gap
new_sources.validation_status: Research published in peer-reviewed journals, Forrester-commissioned studies

honorable_mentions.name: Canary Media
honorable_mentions.reason: Already partially covered by existing environmental sources, but worth noting as dedicated clean energy transition journalism
honorable_mentions.existing_overlap: Carbon Brief, Inside Climate News, CleanTechnica

honorable_mentions.name: Crunchbase News
honorable_mentions.reason: Already have CB Insights and PitchBook covering VC trends. Crunchbase News provides similar coverage.

honorable_mentions.name: Everstream Analytics
honorable_mentions.reason: Specialized supply chain risk - useful but narrow focus. Consider for sector-specific scans.

honorable_mentions.name: Archie App Blog
honorable_mentions.reason: Good hybrid workplace statistics aggregator but not original research. Secondary source.

honorable_mentions.name: ESG Today
honorable_mentions.reason: Already covered by ESG Dive and other sustainability sources. Redundant coverage.

Social.coverage_improvement: Significant - adds Gen Z behavioral research and workplace mental health data
Social.gaps_remaining: Aging population research, family structure trends

Technological.coverage_improvement: Excellent - adds quantum specialization, biotech-AI intersection, enterprise IT perspective

Economic.coverage_improvement: Good - adds data visualization aggregation and MENA economic perspective

Political.coverage_improvement: Excellent - adds tech policy, defense strategy, and non-Western geopolitical analysis
Political.gaps_remaining: Minimal - diverse regional and thematic coverage

Spiritual.coverage_improvement: Significant - workplace mental health and Gen Z meaning-seeking research
Spiritual.gaps_remaining: Traditional religion trends, meditation science, psychedelic therapy research
Spiritual.urgent_need: Still weakest STEEPS category - need more Tier 1 sources

immediate_addition: The Quantum Insider - quantum tech inflection point tracking
War on the Rocks - defense tech critical analysis
trial_period: Visual Capitalist - validate signal quality vs. existing economic sources
StartUs Insights - compare with existing innovation tracking
watch_list: Everstream Analytics - consider for supply chain deep-dive scans
Spring Health Research - monitor research publication frequency

next_steps.stage_2_strategy_2: Backward scanning - analyze 2020-2025 signals to identify evergreen high-quality sources
next_steps.stage_2_strategy_3: Cross-domain scanning - explore sources at STEEPS category intersections
next_steps.spiritual_category_boost: Priority search for academic journals on religious studies, psychedelic research, contemplative neuroscience

metadata.confidence_level: High - all sources validated through multiple searches and web fetches
